TreeViews.jl

  • Readme
  • Docstrings
    • Docstrings
    Docstrings
    TreeViews.TreeViews
    TreeViews.eval
    TreeViews.hastreeview — Function.
    hastreeview(x::T)::Bool

    Called by a frontend to decide whether a tree view for type T is available. Defaults to false.

    TreeViews.include
    TreeViews.nodelabel — Function.
    nodelabel(io::IO, x::T, i::Integer, mime::MIME"text/plain" = MIME"text/plain"())

    Prints the label of x's i-th child to io. Like with Base.show there are also methods with mime::AbstractString and no mime argument at all (which falls back to MIME"text/plain"()). Please only overload the nodelabel(io::IO, x, i::Integer, mime::MIME) form.

    TreeViews.numberofnodes — Function.
    numberofnodes(x)

    Number of direct descendents. Defaults to fieldcount(typeof(x)).

    TreeViews.treelabel — Function.
    treelabel(io::IO, x, mime = MIME"text/plain"())

    Prints x's tree header to io. Like with Base.show there are also methods with mime::AbstractString and no mime argument at all (which falls back to MIME"text/plain"()). Please only overload the treelabel(io::IO, x, mime::MIME) form.

    TreeViews.treenode — Function.
    treenode(x::T, i::Integer)

    Returns the i-th node of x, which is usually printed by the display frontend next to the corresponding treelabel.
